issue_title: [Feature] Add due_date field for task scheduling

implementation.summary: Added due_date field to Todo dataclass with is_overdue() method, CLI --due flag support, and overdue status visual indicator in formatter
acceptance_criteria_met: CLI supports --due flag on add command

risks_and_limitations: due_date is stored as ISO date string (YYYY-MM-DD), no timezone support
is_overdue() compares against local date.today(), not UTC
Invalid date formats in due_date field are silently ignored (treated as not overdue)
